keyMoments.title: Henzo's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Professor Henzo introduces himself to Robin, Luffy, and Usopp as a scientist researching the Rainbow Mist phenomenon.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Henzo as the central guest character whose personal quest drives the Ruluka Island Arc storyline.
keyMoments.quote: I'm Professor Henzo, and I've dedicated my life to researching the Rainbow Mist.

keyMoments.title: Revelation of Lost Friends
keyMoments.description: Henzo reveals that fifty years ago, his five childhood friends disappeared into the Rainbow Mist and he has been searching for them ever since.
keyMoments.significance: Provides Henzo's emotional motivation and establishes the personal stakes that drive him to extreme actions.
keyMoments.quote: My friends disappeared into that mist fifty years ago, and I've been searching for them ever since.

keyMoments.title: Stealing the Going Merry
keyMoments.description: Desperate to seize his chance after fifty years of waiting, Henzo commandeers the Going Merry and sails into the Rainbow Mist without permission.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the depth of Henzo's desperation and dedication, forcing the Straw Hats to pursue him and setting up the arc's main adventure.
keyMoments.quote: I've waited fifty years for this moment! I won't let this chance slip away!

affiliations.notes: Childhood pirate crew that disbanded when friends disappeared into Rainbow Mist

abilities.description: Henzo is a skilled scientist and inventor who has spent fifty years researching the Rainbow Mist phenomenon and developing technology to explore it.
Henzo demonstrates capability in sailing and navigation when he takes the Going Merry into the Rainbow Mist.

relationships.description: Rapanui was one of Henzo's five childhood friends who disappeared into the Rainbow Mist fifty years ago. Henzo has been searching for him ever since.

evolutionMoments.description: Henzo reveals that Rapanui was one of his closest childhood friends who vanished into the Rainbow Mist.

relationships.description: Isoka was one of Henzo's childhood friends who disappeared into the Rainbow Mist fifty years ago.

evolutionMoments.description: Mentioned as one of Henzo's lost friends from the past.

relationships.description: Henzo meets Luffy and receives help from the Straw Hat Pirates in his quest to find his friends, though he initially takes their ship without permission.

evolutionMoments.description: Henzo meets Luffy, Robin, and Usopp and shares his story with them.

reveals.information: Has been researching the Rainbow Mist for fifty years to find his lost childhood friends
Sacrificed himself by falling into the sea so his friends could escape from Wetton's attack
Considered himself weak as a youth but possessed strong inventor skills

keyMoments.title: Marine Chase
keyMoments.description: Lieutenant Commander Rapanui Pasqua leads a fleet of 9 Marine ships in pursuit of the Straw Hat Pirates' Going Merry.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Rapanui as a Marine officer, though his true identity as one of Henzo's lost friends is not yet revealed to viewers.

keyMoments.title: Finger Bomb Technique
keyMoments.description: Rapanui demonstrates his signature Finger Bomb technique, flinging a coin at incredible speed, but accidentally hits his own ship when he sneezes.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Rapanui's unique combat ability and provides comic relief while allowing the Straw Hats to escape.

affiliations.notes: Active Marine officer in present time
Childhood pirate crew formed with Henzo and friends fifty years prior

age: Appears as child in flashbacks (50 years ago)

abilities.description: Rapanui can fling coins at targets from far distances with his bare fingers at incredibly high speeds, with enough force to sink pirate ships and destroy Marine vessels.
Rapanui possesses exceptional finger strength, allowing him to perform his Finger Bomb technique with devastating effect.

relationships.description: Rapanui was one of Henzo's five childhood friends who planned to become pirates together before being separated by the Rainbow Mist incident.

evolutionMoments.description: Revealed to be one of Henzo's childhood friends who disappeared into the Rainbow Mist fifty years ago.

reveals.information: Can perform the Finger Bomb technique with devastating accuracy
Was one of Henzo's childhood friends who disappeared into the Rainbow Mist fifty years ago
Serves as a Marine Lieutenant Commander in the present day

keyMoments.title: Mentioned in Henzo's Backstory
keyMoments.description: Isoka is revealed to be one of Henzo's five childhood friends who disappeared into the Rainbow Mist fifty years ago.
keyMoments.significance: Part of the group that motivates Henzo's fifty-year quest and establishes the Pumpkin Pirates crew.

statusHistory.notes: Disappeared into Rainbow Mist fifty years ago

affiliations.notes: Member of childhood pirate crew that disappeared into Rainbow Mist

relationships.description: One of Henzo's childhood friends who disappeared into the Rainbow Mist.

evolutionMoments.description: Mentioned as one of Henzo's lost friends.

reveals.information: Was part of the Pumpkin Pirates childhood crew that disappeared into the Rainbow Mist

keyMoments.description: Akibi is revealed to be one of Henzo's five childhood friends who disappeared into the Rainbow Mist fifty years ago.
keyMoments.significance: Part of the group that motivates Henzo's fifty-year quest.
